Gudibande_Fort.desc: An ancient hilltop fort offering stunning panoramic views and a peaceful trek, located near Chikkaballapur.

Banavasi.desc: A historic town known for its cultural heritage, Banavasi is one of the oldest towns in Karnataka, home to the famous Madhukeshwara Temple.

Kudumari_Waterfalls.desc: A secluded waterfall near Kundapura, nestled in dense forests and requiring a short trek to reach.

Siddara_Betta.desc: A peaceful hill known for meditation, trekking, and ancient caves, situated near Tumkur.

Savehaklu_Reservoir.desc: A scenic reservoir near Agumbe, surrounded by lush green hills, offering a serene getaway and panoramic views.
